name: Chocolate Orange
description:
SWEETLY UPLIFTING!

This is a gorgeous smelling soap and highly moisturising. Essential oils of sweet orange and ginger are added to a nourishing combination of cocoa butter, shea butter and carrot tissue oil which is beneficial for dry and mature skins. Cocoa powder is added to the soap which does make it look good enough to eat but please do not try! You would definitely be foaming at the mouth! 

An all over treat! A good choice for the men in our life.

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.

No less than 120g per bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Olivate (Olive oil), Sodium Cocoate (Coconut oil), Aqua (Water), Avocado Butter, Cocoa Butter, Carrot tissue oil, Ginger Essential Oil, Sweet Orange Essential Oil, *Limonene,  *Linalool, * Citral, Cocoa Powder. *Naturally occurring in essential oils.

name: Camomile & Shea Butter
description:
KIND & GENTLE

This soap contains no essential oils so is unscented apart from a very delicate scent from the dried camomile renowned for it's calming properties. It is rich in shea butter and is perfect for dry and sensitive skins. It also contains wheatgerm oil and carrot tissue oil which combined with shea butter, makes this a highly moisturising but very gentle soap. The water contained is infused with dried camomile flowers and with the addition of soya milk gives this soap a lovely creamy texture.

As a finishing touch, there is a sprinkling of dried camomile flowers on top of the soap.

Gentle enough for the face, hands and body - perfect for sensitive and very dry skins. Also a great alternative to shaving foam or gel.

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.

No less than 120g per bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Olivate (Olive oil), Sodium Cocoate (Coconut oil), Aqua (Water) infused with dried camomile flowers,  Soya milk, Shea Butter, Wheatgerm Oil.

name: Lavender & Thyme
description:
CALMING

The wonderful calming properties of lavender essential oil make this soap a very popular choice, combined with essential oil of thyme adds a natural antiseptic property to the soap.  As with all Blossom Tree soaps this is highly moisturising and includes shea and cocoa butters together with the skin nourishing carrot tissue oil which is beneficial for mature and dry skins.

The top of the soap is sprinkled with dried lavender flowers.

Gentle enough for the face, hands and body.

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.

No less than 120g per bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Olivate (Olive oil), Sodium Cocoate (Coconut oil), Aqua (Water), Cocoa Butter,  Shea Butter, Carrot tissue oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Thyme Essential Oil, *Linalool, *Limonene, *Geraniol, *Citral, Dried Lavender Flowers. *Naturally occurring in essential oils.

name: Lemongrass & Rosemary
description:
INVIGORATING

A highly moisturing and nourishing combination of shea butter and carrot tissue oil with the addition of our own beeswax which is a natural antiseptic together with a handful of poppy seeds which act as a gentle exfoliator.

Essential oils of lemongrass and rosemary make this a fabulously refreshing and uplifting soap. Breath in the wonderful aroma.

Great for the body or just treat your hard working hands. Another good choice for the men!

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.

No less than 120g per bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Olivate (Olive oil), Sodium Cocoate (Coconut oil), Aqua (Water), Beeswax, Shea Butter, Carrot Tissue Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil,  Lemongrass Essential Oil, * Citral *Limonene,  *Geraniol, *Linalool, *Citronellol, *Euganol,  Poppy Seeds. *Naturally occurring in essential oils.

name: Rose Geranium & Bergamot
description:
SENSUAL

This is really special. It fills your senses and you instantly feel a sense of well being.  A blend of Rose Geranium and Bergamot essential oils give this soap both floral and citrus notes. It has the added benefit of the wonderful moisturising shea butter and nourishing carrot tissue oil which is beneficial for dry, sensitive and mature skins. It also contains a "spoonful" of powdered rhassoul which is a natural, very fine powdered clay used for gentle exfoliation.

This soap is perfect for face, hands and an all over treat in the shower or bath. Breath in the wonderful aroma and relax.

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.

No less than 120g per bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Olivate (Olive Oil), Sodium Cocoate (Coconut Oil), Aqua (Water), Shea Butter, Carrot Tissue Oil, Rose Geranium Essential Oil, Bergamot Essential Oil, *Limonene, *Citronelli, *Linalool, *Geranial, *Citral,  Rhassoul (powdered clay). *Naturally occurring in essential oils.

name: Wedding & Special Event Favours (sample)
description:
Please refer to our Weddings & Special Events Page for further details.

If you would like to order a sample of our soap, we can send one out to you prior to you discussing your exact requirements. Please choose which one you would like to try from our current range using the drop down menu.

For reference, our soap favours are half the size of our regular wrapped bars.

A Soapy Note: To help extend the life of your soap, after using put it somewhere dry and where any excess water can drain off.
